text: Aleksei Anatolyevich Klestov (; born 27 August 1974) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Sportspeople from Yaroslavl Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Shinnik Yaroslavl players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Tyumen players Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players Category:FC Kristall Smolensk players Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Lukhovitsy players
title: Aleksei Klestov
